title: Olympics offers another reason for Indians to visit France
description: Indian interest in traveling to France for the 2024 Olympic Games is booming. Airbnb has reported a 30% increase in bookings from Indian guests in Paris and surrounding cities like Saint-Denis and Bordeaux. Overall, bookings in Paris for the Games have surged by 400% compared to last year. Thomas Cook (India) is offering premium MICE packages for about â‚¹11 lakh per person, covering major events and VIP hospitality. Online visa applications for France from India have risen by 60%, prompting French consulates to expedite processing times to under a week.
